snippet.title: Apex Legends Mobile: Cold Snap Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Brace yourself, Legends: a Cold Snap is coming to Apex Legends Mobile! Welcome Loba to the Legends and see how the Games are evolving in Apex Legends Mobile: Cold Snap. 

 
Apex Legends Mobile™ is a free-to-play hero shooter  game where legendary characters battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier. Play for free now on iOS and Android!

Learn more about Apex Legends Mobile: http://x.ea.com/73456
 
Check out our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/PlayApexMobile
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/playapex.
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playapex/.

#ApexLegendsMobile  #ApexColdSnap #ApexLegends
